content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the kaunas district court the court decided to keep a vehicle registered under the defendants name and declared certain properties as the defendants personal property the applicant filed an amended application to the court of appeal requesting recognition of the vehicle and properties as their own compensation for property acquired during the marriage maintenance for their disabled adult son and costs of the case the court of appeal recognized the properties as common property awarded compensation to the applicant and ordered the defendant to pay the costs of the case the court partially upheld the claims and determined that the vehicle and certain properties remain the defendants personal property the court also ordered the state to pay the defendants costs and the defendant to pay the applicants costs

metadata.cost: 713.31 EUR (legal fees + court fees) + 33.20 EUR (court fees) to be borne by the defendant 15.10 EUR (legal fees) + 763.00 EUR (stamp duty) to be borne by the applicant
